special_text:
[i](Gain the next level as a sorcery to add its ability.)[/i]
At the beginning of your end step, you may return a permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.
{B}{R}{G}: Level 2
Non-Human creatures you control get +2/+1 and have trample.
{1}{B}{R}{G}: Level 3
If a creature would die, you may exile it instead. If you do, put X +1/+1 counters onto up to one target creature you control.
